issue.title: Spacing and Copy on Lock Message
issue.body:
[![Screenshot_2023-08-18_16-46-54.png](https://mrkr.io/s/64dfa07e4fbdc381494a902d/2)](https://mrkr.io/s/64dfa07e4fbdc381494a902d/0) Slightly better image. ![image](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/assets/114953617/5ceae097-dd3d-4a66-a899-ba881e3acf54) ### Parent Issue https://github.com/dotCMS/core/issues/25811 ### Problem Statement The spacing on this message isn't aligned with the new style guide. Nor is the orange color on the lock. We need a new design that accounts for this text. I'll work with Melissa to provide one as soon as she's back. Also, the copy is bad. Should just say, "Locked by **{User Name}**" instead of "This Page is locked by user..." ### Steps to Reproduce Find content that is locked by another user, so you can see the locked by message. ### Acceptance Criteria ### dotCMS Version ### External Links... Slack Conversations, Support Tickets, Figma Designs, etc. ### Assumptions & Initiation Needs ### Quality Assurance Notes & Workarounds ### Sub-Tasks & Estimates --- **Reported by:** Damen Gilland (damen.gilland@dotcms.com) **Source URL:** [https://dotcms-qa-master.dotcms.site/dotAdmin/#/edit-page/content?url=%2Ftest%2Ftesting&language_id=1&device_inode=](https://dotcms-qa-master.dotcms.site/dotAdmin/#/edit-page/content?url=%2Ftest%2Ftesting&language_id=1&device_inode=) **Issue details:** [Open in Marker.io](https://app.marker.io/i/64dfa07e4fbdc381494a9030_14fb54e65bca62e8?advanced=1)
Device typedesktop
BrowserFirefox 116.0
Screen Size2560 x 1440
OSOS X 10.15
Viewport Size2560 x 1302
Zoom Level100%
Pixel Ratio@​2x

comment.body: It won't be solved as there will be a new implementation that will remove the usage of locks

issue.title: UX: Close the preview when you click outside of the modal
issue.body:
### Parent Issue
Related to : #25813 

### Problem Statement

On edit mode, when you are editing a page and you click in the preview modal we are opening a modal with all the devices configuration that we have added to the system, but to close this we need to click again in the preview button. 

We need to be able to close at the moment that you click out of the modal, this is to make the navigation easier for the end user and avoid still navigating with this modal opened. 

![image](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/assets/2641437/187f22db-bf2f-4160-8815-bfe84850274e)



### Steps to Reproduce

- Login as admin
- Open a page 
- In edit mode click on the preview button 
- Click out of the modal to make sure we are closing it 

### Acceptance Criteria

- We need to automatically close if you do any click out of the modal. 
- We need to come back to edit mode and continue navigating normally 

### dotCMS Version

Tested on master // docker // Chrome 

### Proposed Objective

Quality Assurance

issue.title: UX: Close the preview when you click outside of the modal
issue.body:
### Parent Issue
Related to : #25813 

### Problem Statement

On edit mode, when you are editing a page and you click in the preview modal we are opening a modal with all the devices configuration that we have added to the system, but to close this we need to click again in the preview button. 

We need to be able to close at the moment that you click out of the modal, this is to make the navigation easier for the end user and avoid still navigating with this modal opened. 

![image](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/assets/2641437/187f22db-bf2f-4160-8815-bfe84850274e)



### Steps to Reproduce

- Login as admin
- Open a page 
- In edit mode click on the preview button 
- Click out of the modal to make sure we are closing it 

### Acceptance Criteria

- We need to automatically close if you do any click out of the modal. 
- We need to come back to edit mode and continue navigating normally 

### dotCMS Version

Tested on master // docker // Chrome 

### Proposed Objective

Quality Assurance

issue.title: 26491 edit content add checkbox and multiselect fields to the form
issue.body:
<!--
copilot:all
-->
### <samp>🤖 Generated by Copilot at de872b5</samp>

### Summary
🆕🧪🛠️

<!--
1.  🆕 - This emoji indicates that new features or components were added to the codebase, such as the checkbox and multi-select fields and their corresponding templates and logic.
2.  🧪 - This emoji indicates that tests were added or updated to cover the new features or components, such as the spec files for the checkbox and multi-select fields and the dot-edit-content-field component.
3.  🛠️ - This emoji indicates that some refactoring or improvement was done to the existing code, such as the utils file, the constants file, the import paths, and the handling of flattened fields.
-->
This pull request adds support for editing checkbox and multi-select fields in the content editing interface, by creating new components for these field types and integrating them with the existing dot-edit-content-field component. It also refactors and improves some of the code related to field types and values, by extracting constants, enums, and utils to separate files and modules.

> _`dot-edit-content`_
> _New fields for checkbox, select_
> _Spring of components_

### Walkthrough
*  Add new components for checkbox and multi-select fields ([link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-4bb28174d325be880eaf232e98a91121870d37d4dc599b99b5f1acb7c38c8520R1-R8), [link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-c6921bbd984f3073f299b9303eca9c6679f8bea782942224fab24aa8dea55026R1-R108), [link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-359991e5bd70237d34ef68502b1d0d108952211388031b6c92b5bd7edf11d4e7R1-R43), [link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-44f9d74415d1bb2c028ac3f8816b360fb557430f1e7769fca3624cddf2f060daR1-R5), [link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-fa1f1403a15f3f5aa9a2e9aa6f0a7e6753d5ace169b85c6b736be7416cf5ae53R1-R80), [link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-66d3a28b559435ad59fd202515759648f7fb03130d763e779367d9ce57f690f4R1-R33))
*  Import and declare new components in `dot-edit-content-fields.module.ts` ([link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-4c8a279470ceb366e4f859ef3a36b8678702237576f7e4d9db1622fd9b0f8978R4-R5), [link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-4c8a279470ceb366e4f859ef3a36b8678702237576f7e4d9db1622fd9b0f8978L16-R20), [link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-4c8a279470ceb366e4f859ef3a36b8678702237576f7e4d9db1622fd9b0f8978L23-R29))
*  Render new components based on field type in `dot-edit-content-field.component.html` ([link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-685da2f87189fff825b7aec2666cfbabdb33c40f8f9d8c82df77ebb8652ccd4aR28-R37))
*  Add new values for checkbox and multi-select field types to `FIELD_TYPES` enum ([link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-aa72329fa1c18891b5d44042ac6ae09ff3d915621f16a084982f87d068c2453aL18-R20))
*  Add new constants for calendar and flattened field types in `dot-edit-content-field.constant.ts` ([link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-8bf2337f0dcafc78712e3ef3394b00a1cccdb0df916df36309dff5a40465e7f9R1-R5))
*  Import and use new constants and enum in `dot-edit-content-field.component.ts` and `dot-edit-content-form.component.ts` ([link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-f03434ad88316542a23c3fb0bf50b6650130632c3e7953d7ee3c882cb5950d06L9-R14), [link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-52fdc67adc70be54cf6c07ee18c9340c26cbf50a4d8fe5ed14a21d33def30a23L24-R29))
*  Move field type to component mapping logic to `utils.ts` ([link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-72202882b348384879f6d696ea2c652a334c9cf4d2141b82ca531e37c8f3df2fR1-R26))
*  Import and use field type to component mapping in `dot-edit-content-field.component.spec.ts` ([link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-23d2e2fd9b71e1819e10ae720cb79ecf5e4d75e51fee641b020017fe8186640fR11-R12), [link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-23d2e2fd9b71e1819e10ae720cb79ecf5e4d75e51fee641b020017fe8186640fL28-R32))
*  Update utility functions to handle flattened field values in `functions.util.ts` ([link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-99ac6732d97f8e73c67b5464dfb645a4ae4ec51a80005cf22d7f83a27dc43c74L3-R7), [link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-99ac6732d97f8e73c67b5464dfb645a4ae4ec51a80005cf22d7f83a27dc43c74R67-R70))
*  Update saveContentlet method to convert flattened field values to arrays in `dot-edit-content-form.component.ts` ([link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-52fdc67adc70be54cf6c07ee18c9340c26cbf50a4d8fe5ed14a21d33def30a23L111-R122))
*  Add mock objects for checkbox and multi-select fields in `mocks.ts` ([link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-044e3c643ab55d05bd081afffe7251b7ebec1f4c383851aa1a219cdc626093f1R333-R380), [link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-044e3c643ab55d05bd081afffe7251b7ebec1f4c383851aa1a219cdc626093f1L348-R400))

issue.title: 26491 edit content add checkbox and multiselect fields to the form
issue.body:
<!--
copilot:all
-->
### <samp>🤖 Generated by Copilot at de872b5</samp>

### Summary
🆕🧪🛠️

<!--
1.  🆕 - This emoji indicates that new features or components were added to the codebase, such as the checkbox and multi-select fields and their corresponding templates and logic.
2.  🧪 - This emoji indicates that tests were added or updated to cover the new features or components, such as the spec files for the checkbox and multi-select fields and the dot-edit-content-field component.
3.  🛠️ - This emoji indicates that some refactoring or improvement was done to the existing code, such as the utils file, the constants file, the import paths, and the handling of flattened fields.
-->
This pull request adds support for editing checkbox and multi-select fields in the content editing interface, by creating new components for these field types and integrating them with the existing dot-edit-content-field component. It also refactors and improves some of the code related to field types and values, by extracting constants, enums, and utils to separate files and modules.

> _`dot-edit-content`_
> _New fields for checkbox, select_
> _Spring of components_

### Walkthrough
*  Add new components for checkbox and multi-select fields ([link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-4bb28174d325be880eaf232e98a91121870d37d4dc599b99b5f1acb7c38c8520R1-R8), [link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-c6921bbd984f3073f299b9303eca9c6679f8bea782942224fab24aa8dea55026R1-R108), [link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-359991e5bd70237d34ef68502b1d0d108952211388031b6c92b5bd7edf11d4e7R1-R43), [link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-44f9d74415d1bb2c028ac3f8816b360fb557430f1e7769fca3624cddf2f060daR1-R5), [link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-fa1f1403a15f3f5aa9a2e9aa6f0a7e6753d5ace169b85c6b736be7416cf5ae53R1-R80), [link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-66d3a28b559435ad59fd202515759648f7fb03130d763e779367d9ce57f690f4R1-R33))
*  Import and declare new components in `dot-edit-content-fields.module.ts` ([link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-4c8a279470ceb366e4f859ef3a36b8678702237576f7e4d9db1622fd9b0f8978R4-R5), [link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-4c8a279470ceb366e4f859ef3a36b8678702237576f7e4d9db1622fd9b0f8978L16-R20), [link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-4c8a279470ceb366e4f859ef3a36b8678702237576f7e4d9db1622fd9b0f8978L23-R29))
*  Render new components based on field type in `dot-edit-content-field.component.html` ([link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-685da2f87189fff825b7aec2666cfbabdb33c40f8f9d8c82df77ebb8652ccd4aR28-R37))
*  Add new values for checkbox and multi-select field types to `FIELD_TYPES` enum ([link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-aa72329fa1c18891b5d44042ac6ae09ff3d915621f16a084982f87d068c2453aL18-R20))
*  Add new constants for calendar and flattened field types in `dot-edit-content-field.constant.ts` ([link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-8bf2337f0dcafc78712e3ef3394b00a1cccdb0df916df36309dff5a40465e7f9R1-R5))
*  Import and use new constants and enum in `dot-edit-content-field.component.ts` and `dot-edit-content-form.component.ts` ([link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-f03434ad88316542a23c3fb0bf50b6650130632c3e7953d7ee3c882cb5950d06L9-R14), [link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-52fdc67adc70be54cf6c07ee18c9340c26cbf50a4d8fe5ed14a21d33def30a23L24-R29))
*  Move field type to component mapping logic to `utils.ts` ([link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-72202882b348384879f6d696ea2c652a334c9cf4d2141b82ca531e37c8f3df2fR1-R26))
*  Import and use field type to component mapping in `dot-edit-content-field.component.spec.ts` ([link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-23d2e2fd9b71e1819e10ae720cb79ecf5e4d75e51fee641b020017fe8186640fR11-R12), [link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-23d2e2fd9b71e1819e10ae720cb79ecf5e4d75e51fee641b020017fe8186640fL28-R32))
*  Update utility functions to handle flattened field values in `functions.util.ts` ([link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-99ac6732d97f8e73c67b5464dfb645a4ae4ec51a80005cf22d7f83a27dc43c74L3-R7), [link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-99ac6732d97f8e73c67b5464dfb645a4ae4ec51a80005cf22d7f83a27dc43c74R67-R70))
*  Update saveContentlet method to convert flattened field values to arrays in `dot-edit-content-form.component.ts` ([link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-52fdc67adc70be54cf6c07ee18c9340c26cbf50a4d8fe5ed14a21d33def30a23L111-R122))
*  Add mock objects for checkbox and multi-select fields in `mocks.ts` ([link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-044e3c643ab55d05bd081afffe7251b7ebec1f4c383851aa1a219cdc626093f1R333-R380), [link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-044e3c643ab55d05bd081afffe7251b7ebec1f4c383851aa1a219cdc626093f1L348-R400))
*  Remove unused imports and update import paths in various files ([link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-f03434ad88316542a23c3fb0bf50b6650130632c3e7953d7ee3c882cb5950d06L9-R14), [link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-044e3c643ab55d05bd081afffe7251b7ebec1f4c383851aa1a219cdc626093f1L16-L17), [link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-99ac6732d97f8e73c67b5464dfb645a4ae4ec51a80005cf22d7f83a27dc43c74L3-R7))
*  Move imports array from component decorator to standalone decorator in `dot-edit-content-field.component.ts` ([link](https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/26535/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-f03434ad88316542a23c3fb0bf50b6650130632c3e7953d7ee3c882cb5950d06L31-R31))

issue.title: Workflow API unable to archive contentlet
issue.body:
### Describe the bug
The user is unable to archive content through workflow API.
Related Ticket: https://dotcms.zendesk.com/agent/tickets/108331

### To Reproduce
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Call the workflow API.
2. Check the response.
3. ```{"message": "Can't change state of checked out content or where inode is not set. Use Search or Find then use method"}```


### Expected behavior
Contentlet must be archived

```
curl --location --request PUT 'https://demo.dotcms.com/api/v1/workflow/actions/fire' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJzdWIiOiJhcGlhNmVhMzIzMC02YmE4LTQ3ZjEtOGM3OC0xMGE3ZTIyNzAwOTAiLCJ4bW9kIjoxNjYyMDc3MDY0MDAwLCJuYmYiOjE2NjIwNzcwNjQsImlzcyI6IjVjMjMwN2E0MjciLCJleHAiOjE2NjI5NDEwNjQsImlhdCI6MTY2MjA3NzA2NCwianRpIjoiYWMwMzU2MmItZjdiNS00OTkzLTg5NDUtOTE0YTRkYTIyOTExIn0.MjCNu8JLC6iFW5UNrbmRlapnRxLcqesYiTtkB7HBAss' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data-raw '{
    "actionName": "Archive",
    "comments": "saving content",
    "contentlet": {
        "contentType": "Activity",
        "identifier": "50757fb4-75df-4e2c-8335-35d36bdb944b",
        "inode": "8df9a375-0386-401c-b5d6-da21c1c5c301"
    }
}'
```
Note: Workflow API is working fine for other actions like publish.

pull_request.title: Making Workflow API capable to archive contentlet
pull_request.body:
### Proposed Changes
Contentlet must be archived

### Checklist
- [x] Tests
- [ ] Translations
- [ ] Security Implications Contemplated (add notes if applicable)

### Additional Info
**The inode becomes blank when the request is sent in JSON format.**

This pull request enhances the `save` method of the `SystemTableResource` class, which handles key-value pairs in the system table. It adds better validation and documentation for the method arguments and simplifies the error handling.

issue.title: Enable better logging for getPageByPath in HTMLPageAssetAPIImpl.java
issue.body:
### Parent Issue

_No response_

### User Story

We have an issue with one of the customers seeing errors as below.

25/10/23 09:40:45:059 GMT] ERROR business.HTMLPageAssetAPIImpl: Unable to find/index [25/10/23 09:40:45:090 GMT] WARN servlet.VelocityServlet: Page '/index' not found [25/10/23 09:40:45:091 GMT] WARN servlet.VelocityServlet: Page '/index' not found

(https://github.com/dotCMS/core/blob/8dd5b7ac2159bf3e50909dca3c47e3f9eac069d6/dotCMS/src/main/java/com/dotmarketing/portlets/htmlpageasset/business/HTMLPageAssetAPIImpl.java#L251-L251)

Logger.error(this.getClass(), "Unable to find" + uri);
Better logging be added here to log the host details and language ID for better identification.


### Acceptance Criteria

Better logging functionality added.

### Proposed Objective

Core Features

### Proposed Priority

Priority 2 - Important

### External Links... Slack Conversations, Support Tickets, Figma Designs, etc.

_No response_

### Assumptions & Initiation Needs

_No response_

### Quality Assurance Notes & Workarounds

_No response_

### Sub-Tasks & Estimates

_No response_
